staticselector

Class StaticAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • staticselector.StaticAnalyzer

  • public class StaticAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses CallGraph, extracts static features of methods and build a map .

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()

      • isLibraryClass

        private boolean isLibraryClass(SootClass sclass)
        Checks if input class is member of a library package.
        Parameters:
        sclass - Input class.
        Returns:
        true if class is member of a library package, false otherwise.

      • generalFeatureExtraction

        private void generalFeatureExtraction()
        Iterates over all application classes and methods, and create an Feature object for each method.

      • propagateFeatures

        private void propagateFeatures()
        Traverses the CG and propagates features from each callee to its callers.

      • getFeatures

        public Features getFeatures(SootMethod method)
        Returns the Features object of a given method passes as parameter. In case of no object found, a new one will be created and returned.
        Parameters:
        method - Method which features are required.
        Returns:
        Features object.

      • dumpIR

        public void dumpIR()

      • printFeaturesMap

        public void printFeaturesMap()
        Print the features Map of each method using the percentage notation for each category of interest.

      • addProfilingInfo

        public void addProfilingInfo()
        Adds profiling information into selected methods. The profiling information contains execution time and feature count.

      • getFeaturesStream

        private java.lang.String getFeaturesStream(SootMethod sm)
        Looks for features associated to input method and serialize them into a single String.
        Parameters:
        sm - Input SootMethod.
        Returns:
        Serialized string.

      • addDumper

        private void addDumper(SootMethod sm)
        Adds a call to a dump method in the external logging library. The library then logs the data to a file (ideally). This method looks for the main method of the target application.
        Parameters:
        body - Body of the main method.

      • profileMethod

        private void profileMethod(SootMethod sm)
        Adds profiling information in input method.
        Parameters:
        sm - Input method.

      • findExitUnits

        private java.util.List<Unit> findExitUnits(Body body)
        Get all exit points in the input body.
        Parameters:
        body - Input body.
        Returns:
        List of all exit points.

      • insertDeclaration

        private Local insertDeclaration(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                Body body)
        Method for inserting local declaration in sootMethod.
        Parameters:
        name - Local ASCII name.
        type - Local type.
        body - Method's body.
        Returns:
        Reference to the local, already inserted into the method's body.
